title: Mecca Pimp: A Novel of Love and Human Trafficking
description: Meet Mary and Mark Black, a mythic couple whose precious love has taken a turn for the worse. A journey across continents, MECCA PIMP is a spirited fable that lays a playful magnifier over marriage and sexuality. Mark Black lives in Saudi Arabia where he runs a mysterious import company. He's hellbent on tracking Mary Black as she wanders out of her home in New York wearing medieval garb. The fearless heroine is obsessed with discovering what it means to create a new life. In her unpredictable quest, she will stop at nothing, knowing he's determined to destroy her. Bernard Radfar has written a blitzkrieg of a love story that is an unforgettable cry for a new approach to the adventure of our lives.
author: Bernard Radfar
